content_outline.h1: Lizaro Sport Review: Complete Casino & Sportsbook Analysis

sections.title: Last Updated Badge
sections.instructions: HTML badge component, not written content

sections.title: Introduction
sections.purpose: Quick answer format with affiliate disclosure
sections.instructions: Open with direct answer: 'Lizaro is a Canadian-licensed online casino and sportsbook offering [key features].' Follow with 50-75 word affiliate disclosure. Total 100-150 words. Naturally incorporate 'online gambling canada'.

sections.title: Comparison Table
sections.purpose: Visual comparison of Lizaro vs 3 alternatives
sections.instructions: Table comparing Lizaro, Treasure Spins, Royalistplay, and Wyns. Columns: Rating, Casino Games, Sports Betting, Welcome Bonus, Payment Methods, Support. Phase 3 will build HTML.

sections.title: Quick Rating Summary
sections.instructions: Star rating display (4.0/5). List 4 pros, 4 cons in bullet format. Add 'Best for: [specific player type]' statement. Total 100 words.

sections.title: Lizaro Casino & Sportsbook Overview
sections.purpose: Introduce Lizaro's dual offering and position in Canadian market
sections.instructions: Use 'online casino canada' in H2 or opening sentence. Cover: What is Lizaro, licensing status, combined casino/sports platform, years in operation, ownership, Canadian market positioning. 300 words.

sections.title: Lizaro Welcome Bonus & Promotions
sections.purpose: Detailed bonus breakdown targeting bonus keywords
sections.instructions: Use 'casino bonus canada' in H2 or opening. Cover: Welcome bonus details (casino + sports), wagering requirements, bonus terms, time limits, game contributions, promo code (if applicable), ongoing promotions. Compare to other Canadian operators. 300 words.

sections.title: Lizaro Casino Games & Slots
sections.instructions: Use 'lizaro casino' in H2. Naturally incorporate 'casino sites canada' (500/mo). Cover: Game library size, slot selection, table games (blackjack, roulette, baccarat), live dealer games, game providers, progressive jackpots, game quality, mobile game performance. 400 words.

subsections.title: Slot Games Selection
subsections.purpose: Detail slot variety and popular titles

subsections.title: Live Casino Experience
subsections.purpose: Live dealer games and streaming quality

sections.title: Lizaro Sports Betting Features
sections.instructions: Use 'sports betting canada' in H2. Naturally incorporate 'online sports betting canada' (700/mo) and 'sportsbook canada' (400/mo). Cover: Sports covered (NHL, NFL, NBA, MLB, soccer, etc.), betting markets depth, live betting, parlay options, odds format, odds competitiveness. Link to parlay calculator and odds calculator. 300 words.

sections.title: Lizaro Mobile App & Mobile Experience
sections.instructions: Cover: Mobile app availability (iOS/Android vs mobile browser), navigation and UX, casino games on mobile, sports betting on mobile, live betting features, account management, deposit/withdrawal on mobile, performance and loading times. Link to 'Best sports betting apps Canada'. 300 words.

sections.title: Payment Methods & Banking Options
sections.purpose: Canadian-specific payment methods with Interac focus
sections.instructions: CRITICAL: Focus on Interac (most popular Canadian method). Cover: Interac e-Transfer, credit/debit cards, e-wallets, cryptocurrency (if available), deposit limits, withdrawal methods, processing times by method, fees, minimum/maximum amounts. 250 words.

sections.title: Customer Support & Help Resources
sections.instructions: Cover: Support channels (live chat, email, phone), availability hours, response time testing, help center/FAQ quality, language support (English/French for Canada), issue resolution effectiveness. 200 words.

sections.title: Is Lizaro Legal in Ontario?
sections.instructions: Use 'online casino ontario' in H2. Cover: Canadian licensing status, iGaming Ontario registration (if applicable), legal framework, age requirements (19+ most provinces, 18+ in AB/MB/QC), verification requirements, responsible gambling tools. Link to 'Online gambling laws in Canada'. 250 words.

sections.title: How Lizaro Compares to Top Canadian Sites
sections.instructions: Use 'best online casino canada' in H2. Compare Lizaro to established Canadian operators. Cover: Game selection comparison, bonus value comparison, payment options, customer support, mobile experience, unique features. 300 words.

subsections.title: Alternatives to Lizaro
subsections.purpose: Link to Treasure Spins, Royalistplay, Wyns reviews

sections.title: Expert Review Verdict
sections.instructions: Use 'online casino reviews' in H2 or opening. Provide clear verdict: What Lizaro does well, where it falls short, who should use it, who should look elsewhere. Include overall rating justification. 200 words.

sections.title: Detailed Pros & Cons
sections.instructions: List 4-5 pros (40-50 words each) and 4-5 cons (40-50 words each). Each point should explain WHY it's a pro/con. Total 200 words.

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.instructions: Create 8 FAQ questions (50-60 words each). Use schema-friendly format. Target remaining keywords and common user questions. Total 450 words.

faqs.question: Is Lizaro safe for real money gambling in Canada?
What is the Lizaro welcome bonus for Canadian players?
Can I play Lizaro on my mobile device?
How fast are withdrawals at Lizaro?
What provinces is Lizaro available in?
What sports can I bet on at Lizaro?
How does Lizaro compare to other Canadian sportsbooks?

sections.title: Responsible Gambling Resources
sections.instructions: Cover: Lizaro's responsible gambling tools (deposit limits, self-exclusion, reality checks), Canadian resources (Responsible Gambling Council, ConnexOntario), problem gambling helplines, age verification. Link to 'Responsible gambling resources' page. 150 words.

tier_1_required: Lizaro official website for feature verification
tier_3_reference: Competitor casino/sportsbook reviews for comparison data
Industry reports on Canadian gambling market
forbidden: Do not cite affiliate sites for pros/cons
Do not use unverified bonus claims
Do not reference outdated licensing information

primary_brand.name: Lizaro
primary_brand.rationale: Smaller Canadian operator with combined casino/sportsbook offering
unique_selling_points: Dual casino and sports betting platform

compliance_requirements.age_disclosure: 19+ in most provinces, 18+ in Alberta, Manitoba, and Quebec
compliance_requirements.no_dated_language: Do not use '2025' or date references in H1 or content

strategic_notes: Primary keyword has 0 volume - focus on capturing broader Canadian casino/sports betting terms
Payment methods section MUST emphasize Interac (most popular in Canada)
Provincial availability is critical for Canadian users - cover all provinces
Combined casino + sportsbook review differentiates from competitors who separate these
Link to calculator tools (parlay, odds) for added utility
Age requirements vary by province - clearly state 19+ default with 18+ exceptions
All 17 secondary keywords mapped to specific sections or FAQs
